screenings.Synopsis: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team join with some familiar allies in a race against time after a mission gone wrong.
screenings.Credits: Starring Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg, Rebecca Ferguson and Alec Baldwin. Produced by Tom Cruise, Christopher McQuarrie, Jake Myers, J.J. Abrams, David Ellison, Dana Goldberg and Don Granger. Written by Christopher McQuarrie. Directed by Christopher McQuarrie.

misc.Description:
Unless otherwise noted, screenings are held at the Academy's Samuel Goldwyn Theater, 8949 Wilshire Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA, 90211. Check back for updates on post-screening guests. Watch previous Academy Conversations here.

Call 310-247-3614 for 24-hour Screening Schedule Information.

Academy Members may bring three guests to screenings.
misc.Screening_Regulations:
Unless otherwise noted, admission is by Academy membership card, which must be presented by the member, who may be accompanied by one guest. Non-members under 13 years of age will not be admitted to any screenings except when the screening is publicized as open to members and their families.

Academy members are reminded that they are personally responsible for the presence and behavior of their guests at screenings. We ask that members refrain from allowing persons unknown to them, or only vaguely known to them, to accompany them into screenings.

Important Note: Membership cards contain a bar code, which will be scanned for admission to all screenings at Academy venues in Los Angeles (Samuel Goldwyn Theater and Linwood Dunn Theater).

Call 310-247-3614 for 24-hour Screening Schedule Information for Los Angeles, New York, and the Bay Area.
